Uses of Package
com.ti.debug.engine.scripting

  • Packages that use com.ti.debug.engine.scripting 
    Package Description
    com.ti.debug.engine.scripting  
  • Classes in com.ti.debug.engine.scripting used by com.ti.debug.engine.scripting 
    Class and Description
    ArmAdvancedFeatures
    This class encapsulates the ARM Debug Properties methods.
    AsmStep
    This class encapsulates the assembly step methods.
    Breakpoint
    This class encapsulates the breakpoint management methods.
    BreakpointProperties
    This class encapsulates the advanced breakpoint management methods.
    CallStack
    This class encapsulates the methods related to the callstack.
    CallStack.RegisterContext 
    ContextStep
    This class encapsulates the context sensitive step methods.
    DebugServer
    Open and maintain a connection to the Debugger.
    DebugSession
    This class encapsulates all of the debugging operations for a given target.
    Expression
    This class encapsulates the target Expression Evaluation methods An instance of this class is automatically created when a new session is opened.

    // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptingEnvironment();
    DebugServer myServer = (DebugServer) env.getServer("DebugServer.1");
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // Evaluate an expression
    long nResult = mySession.expression.evaluate(sExpr);
    Flash
    This class encapsulates the flash programmer methods.
    GlobalBreakpoint
    This class encapsulates the global breakpoint management methods.
    IDebugServerEventListener 
    Memory
    This class encapsulates the memory access methods (save, load, read, write, register access and program load) An instance of this class is automatically created when a new session is opened.

    Note: When specifying file paths during function calls, the slashes need to be represented using '/' or '\\' (with an escape character).

    // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptingEnvironment();
    DebugServer myServer = (DebugServer) env.getServer("DebugServer.1");
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // Load a program
    mySession.memory.loadProgram("./debug/myFile.out");

    ...
    MemoryMap
    This class serves as a encapsulates the memory map methods.
    Options
    This class encapsulates the debug properties methods.
    PageTable 
    Pin
    This class serves as a encapsulates the Pin Connect methods (used with supported simulators to simulate external interrupts).
    Port
    This class serves as a encapsulates the Port Connect methods (used with supported simulators to allow reading and writing of a file through a memory address).
    ProfileActivity
    This class encapsulates the IActivity, providing users with the ability to modify the Activity object, enabling and disabling the activity and modifying the associated properties An instance of this class is automatically created when a new session is opened.

    // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptingEnvironment();
    DebugServer myServer = (DebugServer) env.getServer("DebugServer.1");
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // get a ProfileActivity object
    mySession.profileSetup.printActivityList();
    ProfileActivity myActivity = mySession.profileSetup.getActivity(activityName);

    // list the properties associated with the current activity
    myActivity.listProperties();

    // get a property from an activity list
    Property myProperty = myActivity.getProperty(propertyPath);
    ProfileClock
    This class serves as a encapsulates the Port Connect methods (used with supported simulators to allow reading and writing of a file through a memory address).
    ProfileSetup
    This class encapsulates the IActivityProviderServer.
    Property
    // Create Environment and open a debug session
    ScriptingEnvironment env = new ScriptingEnvironment();
    DebugServer myServer = (DebugServer) env.getServer("DebugServer.1");
    DebugSession mySession = myServer.openSession("*", "*");

    ...

    // get a boolean Property object
    ProfileActivity myActivity = mySession.profileSetup.getActivity(activityName);
    Property myProperty = myActivity.getProperty(propertyPath);
    // set value of property myProperty.setBoolean(true);
    ResetType
    This class encapsulates a reset type that is supported by the target.
    Simultaneous
    This class encapsulates the simultaneous run-control methods (run, halt, etc.), used to perform run-control actions on multiple targets simultaneously.

    Simultaneous functions will be using the timeout value from the environment, and logging will go to the environment log file.
    SourceStep
    This class encapsulates the Source Step methods.
    Symbol
    This class encapsulates the symbol methods.
    Target
    This class encapsulates the target run-control methods (run, halt, reset, etc.) and serves as a container for the stepping classes.
    TargetConfigurationEditor
    This class encapsulates the Target Configuration (editing) functionality.
    TargetConfigurationGenerator
    This class encapsulates the Target Configuration (setup) functionality.
    TargetConfigurationGenerator.CONFIGTYPE
